document.heading: Police and Firefighter’s Retirement and Disability Omnibus Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-314, the “Police and Firefighter’s Retirement and Disability Omnibus Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-1019. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012 and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 1, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-682 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-314 became effective on May 1, 2013.
